description:
After a devastating encounter with a restless spirit, ghost-fearing psychic http://anidb.net/ch127525 [Gentouga Keitarou] became a shut-in to avoid additional spectral catastrophes. But no man is a haunted island, and Keitarou eventually reintegrates with society by getting a part-time job as a tutor to the child prodigy http://anidb.net/ch127523 [Houzuki Yayoi]. Yayoi isn`t just an academic genius, though. She`s a talented psychic medium hell-bent on finding the malevolent spirit behind her mother`s disappearance, and she`s gravely determined to drag Keitarou into her terrifying world of grotesque supernatural phenomenon.
Source: HIDIVE
[i]Note: The first two episodes received an early screening at a special event on June 23, 2023 at Shinjuku Wald 9 in Tokyo. The regular TV broadcast started on July 10, 2023.
Additionally, episodes 12 and 13 received an early screening at a special event on September 24, 2023 at Ikebukuro HUMAX Cinemas in Tokyo.[/i]

titles.title: Ruines du château H - Rang S

REGULAR.description: None who have encountered the castle spirit survived to tell the tale, but both the living and the dead should fear the High Priest; it is not salvation he prays for.

titles.title: The Castle H Ruins, Danger Rank S!

REGULAR.description:
The tunnel is dangerous, and they must keep the High Priest in check. It is for that reason the trio need reinforcements; they need another Graduate.
Source: HIDIVE

Abandon all hope ye who enter here. There is nothing for anyone in this tunnel, save for the depravity of a sadistic spirit.
Source: HIDIVE
